articles.description: Follow live BBC Radio commentaries plus live text & score updates as Southampton host Man City plus more in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Fulham vs Everton & Southampton vs Man City - scores, radio & updates

articles.description: Relegated Southampton shut out lifeless Manchester City to move past the Premier League record low mark of 11 points with a tame goalless draw at St Mary's.
articles.title: Southampton 0-0 Manchester City: Goalless draw moves Saints to 12 points

articles.description: Everton came from behind to beat Fulham at Craven Cottage for their second Premier League win in 11 matches.
articles.title: Fulham 1-3 Everton: Toffees come from behind to dent Cottagers' European hopes

articles.description: Brighton stay in the hunt for a place in Europe thanks to goals from Danny Welbeck and Brajan Gruda at Molineux.
articles.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers 0-2 Brighton & Hove Albion: Brighton win at Wolves to maintain European bid

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Ipswich Town vs Brentford in the Premier League
articles.title: Ipswich Town vs Brentford: Premier League preview, team news, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Carlo Ancelotti calls Xabi Alonso "one of the best in the world" amid rumours the Spaniard will replace him as Real Madrid manager.
articles.title: Real Madrid: Xabi Alonso 'one of the best in the world' says Carlo Ancelotti

articles.description: Chelsea's trophies continue to pile up and so do their records as they finish the WSL season unbeaten - a 'special' achievement for manager Sonia Bompastor.
articles.title: Chelsea: Blues 'special' unbeaten WSL season provides 'moments to remember'

articles.description: American Danielle Collins ends Iga Swiatek's defence of her Italian Open title with a 6-1 7-5 victory in the third round.
articles.title: Italian Open: Danielle Collins beats Iga Swiatek in third round

articles.description: United Arab Emirates get clever to beat Qatar and the rain by retiring out 10 batters in the Women’s T20 World Cup Asia Qualifier.
articles.title: UAE retire out 10 batters against Qatar to beat rain in Women's T20 World Cup Asia qualifier

articles.description: Britain's Josh Tarling claims his first Grand Tour stage win as Primoz Roglic takes the overall Giro d'Italia lead on stage two.
articles.title: Giro d'Italia 2025: Josh Tarling wins first Grand Tour stage as Primoz Roglic takes lead on stage two
